tweets.mensagem: Moving to a green economy is the biggest challenge the world has ever faced. I’m optimistic we can do it, but need to make sure it benefits everyone—including those workers and communities who depend on the fossil fuels that we need to get rid of.
From our Apple family to yours, wishing you a healthy, safe and happy year of the Ox! #LunarNewYear
Play your favorite song in a Tesla & turn the volume to 11. You will see. You will feel #Tesla
